comments:
In the dedug perspective, when attempting to view the values contained in a 
generic hashmap of type HashMap<Integer, Double> (in my case) causes this bug.

The bug can be reproduced simply by clicking on the hashmap entry in the 
variables view and then selecting the "table=..." entry. Selecting any other 
entries in the variables view and then reselecting the "table=.." entry will 
reproduce the bug.

Please see the following stack trace:

Appears to be a regression from 3.1

Fixed in ASTEvaluationEngine.

The evalution of 'toString' for inner types was failing due to the changes for 
bug 104675. We were compiling the expression in the context of Object, but 
inner types are not visible to Object (such as HashMap$Entry). The fix is to 
compile the expression in the context of the outer type (HashMap in this case) 
when an array is of an inner type.
*** Bug 106521 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Note: Added 5 tests to LocalVariableTests in our test suite to test array 
details.
